overview:
Groomed in an entrepreneurial powerhouse in the Silicon Valley and educated at Pepperdine University, I carry a high degree of integrity and entrepreneurial drive. As a co-founder of DebtMarket, Inc, I successfully navigated the volatility of a startup, resulting in an acquisition by a leading global financial services organization.

Formerly a whole loan portfolio analyst/associate at the PE fund ICM and sales manager at Brainpark, I have developed a unique combination of analytical skill, technical knowledge, and business development comprehension. I enjoy strategic planning and consider myself a well rounded professional with entrepreneurial ambition.

I currently serve as a Sales Engineer at a publicly traded global financial services firm. I lead the technical sales efforts for whole loan trading products and services.

I am able to continue a lifelong pursuit of generous giving as a member of the board of directors at the W Charitable Foundation. I have a penchant for sales and am an avid equities trader. In my downtime, you can find me skydiving, wakeboarding, mountain biking, snowboarding, or trying to combine a pair of those. I am also a Crossfit fanatic.

milestones.description: Sold DebtMarket to a Leading Global Financial Services Firm
